channel.title: Flat Designs on Role of colors in Web designing - Case study

item.title: Flat design: The new achievement of designers
item.description: Source: www.pixabay.com/en/gui-interface-internet-program-2457113 A lot of new trends can be seen, when you hear about Web design these days. Some of the most famous trends are chosen by the Web designers, Ux designers, Graphic designers, and so on. As it is an era of technology, peeps are choosing different and modern styles in their inventions. Some years ago, designers were exploring more and more about three-dimensional activities. Especially, in the case of designing, they like to provide drop shadows, stylistic characters, gradients, textures and another type of designs to make an element three-dimensional.
